Class QuestionController

java.lang.Object
ch.quizinno.brainquest.controllers.QuestionController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/questions") public class QuestionController extends Object
Controller for managing questions.

  • Method Details

    • getAllQuestions

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Question>> getAllQuestions(@RequestParam(required=false) Long topicId, @RequestParam(required=false) Difficulty difficulty)
      Retrieves a list of all questions.
      Parameters:
      topicId - the ID of the topic
      difficulty - the difficulty of the question
      Returns:
      a list of all questions

    • createQuestion

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Question> createQuestion(@RequestBody Question question)
      Creates a new question.
      Parameters:
      question - the question to create
      Returns:
      the created question

    • getQuestionById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Question> getQuestionById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves a question by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the question
      Returns:
      the question with the specified ID

    • updateQuestion

      @PatchMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Question> updateQuestion(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody Question questionDetails)
      Updates a question.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the question to update
      questionDetails - the details of the question to update
      Returns:
      the updated question

    • deleteQuestion

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteQuestion(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a question.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the question to delete
      Returns:
      a response entity with no content

    • getQuizQuestion

      @GetMapping("/quiz-question") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<QuizQuestionDTO> getQuizQuestion(@RequestParam Long topicId, @RequestParam Difficulty difficulty, @RequestParam List<Long> excludeIds, @RequestParam String playerName, @RequestParam int score)
      Retrieves a random quiz question.
      Parameters:
      topicId - the ID of the topic
      difficulty - the difficulty of the question
      excludeIds - the IDs of the questions to exclude
      playerName - the name of the player
      score - the score of the player
      Returns:
      a random quiz question

    • checkCorrectAnswer

      @PostMapping("/{id}/correct") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CorrectQuestionDTO> checkCorrectAnswer(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody QuizCorrectAnswerDTO quizCorrectAnswerDTO)
      Checks if the given answer is correct.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the question
      quizCorrectAnswerDTO - the answer to check
      Returns:
      the correct answer

    • useJoker

      @GetMapping("/{id}/joker") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<QuizQuestionDTO> useJoker(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestParam Joker joker)
      Uses a joker to help get the correct answer.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the question
      joker - the joker to use
      Returns:
      the correct answer
